item.title: 艾莉森·罗曼征服番茄酱市场的计划
item.description:
一位超级受欢迎的美食作家踏入了消费品领域。【原文：

A mega-popular food writer enters the world of consumer goods.

】

item.title: 零散新闻：艾莉森·罗曼进军番茄酱市场（播客）
item.description: 艾莉森·罗曼是美食媒体界的一位传奇人物。她创作了多本畅销食谱，其中若干食谱更在网络上引发热潮。她的电子通讯也拥有惊人的读者量。 如今她将个人品牌延伸至消费品领域，近期推出高端罐装番茄酱新品——恰如其名《绝妙酱汁》，通过线上直售渠道销售。那么她对消费品行业及其供应链有何洞见？本期节目中，她将阐述进军该领域的初衷。【原文：Alison Roman is a cult figure in the world of food media. She’s written multiple hit cookbooks and several of her recipes have gone viral. And her newsletter is incredibly popular. Now, she’s putting her name on consumer goods, recently launching a new line of high-end jarred tomato sauce called, appropriately, A Very Good Sauce, which she sells direct online. So what has she learned about the consumer goods industry and its supply chain? On this episode, she explains why she entered the space,】

item.title: 中国智能手机制造商荣耀计划推出类人服务机器人
item.description: 荣耀设备公司将于本周晚些时候推出其首款人形机器人，加入中国企业竞相进军新兴科技领域的行列。【原文：Honor Device Co. will unveil its first humanoid robot later this week, joining a rush by Chinese companies into a burgeoning sector of new technology.】

item.title: 汉莎航空在最后一个季度通过削减成本保持单位成本稳定
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司第四季度成功保持单位成本稳定，表明首席执行官卡斯滕·施波尔的削减成本举措开始见效。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG managed to keep unit costs stable in the fourth quarter, indicating that Chief Executive Officer Carsten Spohr’s cost-cutting push is beginning to pay off.】

item.title: 德国汽车供应商因电动汽车转型放缓而获得债务减免
item.description: ZF弗里德里希港股份公司正因电动汽车转型步伐放缓而获得债务负担的喘息之机，这提振了对变速箱等关键零部件的需求。【原文：ZF Friedrichshafen AG is getting some reprieve from its debt burden with the slower shift to electric cars boosting demand for key components such as gearboxes.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔大幅降价收购庄信万丰催化剂业务
item.description: 霍尼韦尔国际公司签署修订协议，以较低价格收购庄信万丰催化剂技术业务，并将获得必要审批的截止日期延长。【原文：Honeywell International Inc. entered an amended agreement to acquire Johnson Matthey Plc’s Catalyst Technologies, cutting the purchase price and extending the deadline to secure necessary approvals.】

item.title: 沙索增产并增加对冲操作，因油价暴跌拖累利润
item.description: 尽管这家燃料和化工生产商提高了产量并采取对冲措施以应对油价波动，但受原油价格下跌影响，萨索尔有限公司的利润仍大幅下滑。【原文：Sasol Ltd.’s profit plunged on lower crude prices even as the fuel and chemical producer boosted output and hedged against oil volatility.】

item.title: 费沙拉基称，随着美国和伊朗似乎即将开战，油价将飙升
item.description: 能源市场咨询机构FGE NexantECA指出，随着美国与伊朗之间的战争似乎迫在眉睫，油价有望大幅上涨。【原文：Oil stands to rally strongly as war between the US and Iran looks imminent, according to energy market consultancy FGE NexantECA.】

item.title: 意电集团将斥资630亿美元扩大美欧可再生能源投资
item.description: 意大利国家电力公司计划在未来三年深化其在美国和欧洲的业务布局，对风电和电池储能等可再生能源项目展开新一轮投资。【原文：Enel SpA plans to deepen its commitments in the US and Europe over the next three years, with a fresh wave of investments in renewable energy projects such as wind power and battery storage.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司正物色人工智能无法触及的资产
item.description: 摩根士丹利投资管理公司正加码布局新兴市场投资，这些投资不受人工智能热潮影响。该公司副首席投资官吉塔尼亚·坎达里表示，此举旨在为科技板块可能出现的回调做好准备，该板块目前已呈现拥挤态势。【原文：Morgan Stanley Investment Management is adding to emerging-market bets that are insulated from the artificial intelligence boom as it positions for a potential pullback in the crowded tech trade, according to Deputy Chief Investment Officer Jitania Kandhari.】

item.title: 关税不确定性引发连锁反应，股市或将下跌
印度基础设施贷款机构从汇丰银行获得1.25亿美元贷款
item.description: 印度基础设施贷款机构通过首次外币借款筹集了约1.25亿美元，为获取更深厚的全球资本铺平了道路。【原文：India’s infrastructure lender has secured about $125 million through its maiden foreign-currency borrowing, paving the way for access to a deeper pool of global capital.】

item.title: 沙特企业推进IPO计划，提振低迷本土股市
item.description: 多家沙特企业正推进本土上市计划，在油价波动和地缘政治风险拖累基准指数之际，于利雅得市场试探投资者需求。【原文：Several Saudi Arabian firms are pressing ahead with plans for local listings, testing investor appetite in Riyadh at a time when volatile oil prices and geopolitical risks have weighed on the benchmark index.】

item.title: 以色列面临利率紧要关头，伊朗紧张局势迫近
item.description: 以色列央行将于周一召开利率会议，届时将面临艰难抉择：既要应对通胀率下降和货币走强的局面，又要权衡美国可能主导与伊朗爆发冲突的不确定性。【原文：Israel’s central bank is set for a close call when it sets interest rates on Monday, balancing lower inflation and a strong currency against the uncertainties of a potential US-led conflict with Iran.】

item.title: 匈牙利降息周期临近，福林多头依然坚定
item.description: 匈牙利福林汇率近期持续走强，已攀升至两年高位。尽管该国将于周二实施逾一年来的首次降息，但此举不太可能逆转当前汇率走势。【原文：The rally that’s taken the Hungarian forint to two-year highs is unlikely to be derailed by a potential interest rate cut on Tuesday, the country’s first in over a year.】

item.title: 台达电子成为首家市值突破1000亿美元的泰国上市公司
item.description: 德尔塔电子（泰国）有限公司成为该国首家市值突破1000亿美元的企业，此前美国最高法院推翻关税的裁决进一步改善了其人工智能制冷设备的需求前景。【原文：Delta Electronics Thailand Pcl became the country’s first $100 billion company after a US Supreme Court ruling striking down tariffs further improved the demand outlook for its AI cooling equipment.】

item.title: 泰国认为特朗普法院裁定重置美国关税具有积极意义
item.description: 泰国财政部长表示，美国将多项关税统一调降至15%，将增强泰国作为制造业和投资中心的吸引力。【原文：A reset of many US tariffs to a uniform 15% will strengthen Thailand’s appeal as a manufacturing and investment hub, according to the country’s top finance official.】

item.title: 澳大利亚首家特朗普品牌酒店拟建于黄金海岸
item.description: 特朗普集团正计划在澳大利亚打造其首个品牌大厦：这座91层的建筑将酒店与豪华公寓相结合，坐落于昆士兰州黄金海岸的冲浪者天堂度假区。【原文：The Trump Organization is planning its first branded tower in Australia: a 91-storey building combining a hotel and luxury apartments in the Surfers Paradise resort on Queensland’s Gold Coast.】

item.title: 印尼1月罕见出现预算缺口，支出激增26%
item.description: 印度尼西亚1月份出现罕见的预算赤字，此前政府兑现了加速支出以支持经济增长的承诺。【原文：Indonesia posted a rare budget shortfall in January after the government followed through on its pledge to accelerate spending to support economic growth.】

item.title: 贝莱德主动股票投资资深人士贝琳达·博阿将离职
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.）的贝琳达·博阿（Belinda Boa）——一位主动股票投资专家，也是该公司最高级别的女性高管之一——在她的认证领英个人资料中发布消息称，将在效力逾25年后离职。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s Belinda Boa, an active equity specialist and one of the firm’s most senior female executives, is leaving the company after over 25 years, according to a post on her verified LinkedIn profile.】

item.title: 贝恩公司称私募股权行业干旱期现已超过2008年金融危机
item.description: 私募股权行业连续第四年向投资者回报的利润减少，该行业持有3.8万亿美元未售资产，且为新基金筹集资金举步维艰。【原文：Private equity returned fewer profits to investors for a fourth straight year as the industry sat on $3.8 trillion of unsold assets and struggled to raise money for new funds.】

item.title: 卡塔尔主权财富基金投资高盛校友创立的信贷公司5C
item.description: 知情人士透露，卡塔尔规模达5800亿美元的主权财富基金正投资于一家由高盛集团前合伙人汤姆·康诺利和迈克尔·科斯特运营的私募信贷公司。【原文：Qatar’s $580 billion sovereign wealth fund is investing in a private credit firm run by former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. partners Tom Connolly and Michael Koester, according to people with knowledge with the matter.】

item.title: 报告称美国电池市场将逆势增长
item.description: 美国太阳能贸易组织预计，今年能源存储市场将增长21%，因电池需求将抵消政策阻力。【原文：A US solar trade group sees the energy storage market growing by 21% this year as demand for batteries outweighs policy headwinds.】

item.title: 卢拉访韩 韩国、巴西称两国关系迎来"新飞跃"
item.description: 韩国总统李在明与巴西总统路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦达成一系列新协议，涵盖关键矿产和人工智能等领域，同时推动扩大双边合作。这是21年来首位南美国家领导人对韩国进行国事访问。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung and Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva agreed a slew of new deals covering areas including critical minerals and artificial intelligence, while pushing to expand bilateral cooperation during the South American leader’s first state visit to South Korea in 21 years.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔据称下调了对庄信万丰催化剂的价格
item.description: 知情人士透露，霍尼韦尔国际公司已达成协议，将收购庄信万丰催化剂技术业务的价格下调，以挽救这笔交易。【原文：Honeywell International Inc. secured an agreement to cut the price of its acquisition of Johnson Matthey Plc’s Catalyst Technologies to salvage the deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 韩国央行预计芯片热潮将显著推高GDP增长
item.description: 韩国央行表示，得益于芯片热潮和强于预期的全球经济环境，该国以出口为导向的经济今年预计将实现"显著更高"的增长。【原文：South Korea’s export-driven economy is expected to post “significantly higher” growth this year compared to last, supported by a chip boom and a stronger-than-anticipated global backdrop, the central bank said.】

item.title: 美国银行预计更多企业将在菲律宾进行外汇风险对冲
item.description: 据美国银行称，随着全球不确定性加剧导致比索剧烈波动，菲律宾企业正加紧努力限制外汇风险。【原文：Companies in the Philippines are stepping up efforts to limit foreign exchange risks as global uncertainty fuels sharp swings in the peso, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 泰国出口创四年最大增幅 电子产品因人工智能热潮强劲增长
item.description: 电子产品出口增长与原材料及机械进口需求增强，推动泰国进出口额升至四年高位。该国正寻求与美国达成贸易协定。【原文：Outbound shipments of electronic products and stronger inbound demand for raw materials and machinery pushed Thailand’s exports and imports to their highest levels in four years, as the country seeks a trade agreement with the US.】

item.title: 据称KKR同意以13亿美元收购教育公司XCL
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.已同意收购XCL教育控股公司多数股权，该交易对这家东南亚教育运营商的估值约为13亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co. has agreed to buy a majority stake in XCL Education Holdings Pte in a deal that values the Southeast Asian school operator at about $1.3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度国家银行披露账户漏洞后，IDFC First Bank股价暴跌15%
item.description: 印度中型银行IDFC First Bank Ltd.的股价遭遇近六年最大跌幅，此前该行披露与某邦政府相关的账户存在涉嫌欺诈行为，并称哈里亚纳邦政府要求从该行撤资。【原文：IDFC First Bank Ltd. shares tumbled the most in nearly six years after the mid-sized Indian lender disclosed suspected fraud in accounts linked to a state government and said the Haryana state asked to pull funds from the bank.】
